Desc.entry: The aim of Extra Care Schemes is to keep people as independent as possible in homes that are adaptable to changing needs and that allow people to get care services in their own home without having to move to get them. For people aged over 55 years. Has 60 self-contained apartments. Part of South Yorkshire Housing Association which is a registered charity.

category.entry: ACCOMMODATION FOR OLDER PEOPLE - EXTRA CARE SCHEMES
